name: Flying Tank War 2025
description:
Flying Tank War 2025 is an exciting futuristic tank game that involves an ultra mobile gaming experience. Take control of a futuristic flying tank simulator & fly from the checkpoint to destroy enemy base camps. It’s as simple as flying a turbo airplane. Make use of your aircraft pilot skills and car driving ability to drive this extremely futuristic tank. Do drifts and stunts while attacking the terrorists territory, burn the asphalt road with enemy tanks and trucks. It’s 2025, the traditional war tanks are now the modern futuristic flying tanks. Start operating this huge flying tank simulator high in the skies to experience the smooth ride of your life. You can test your pilot skills and tank driving skills at the same time in the best blend of flying tank games and flying car games war missions. The battlefield is full of trucks, tanks and cars. Attack and destroy them, crush them and win the battle. Drive around the city. Perform extreme stunts in a futuristic tough army tank.

Flying Tank War 2025 is the most modern flying tank games among all futuristic flying car games. It’s much more fun than a flying car simulator. For those who love military aircraft simulators & army car games; it’s a blend of both. Fly your military tank like a super fighter airplane. You can test your airplane pilot skills and tank driving ability at the same time. Fly or drive your tank. Fight with the enemies and win the battle as a commander in chief. Unlike driving in the city, shooting the terrorists, robbers & escaped prisoners; Flying War tank simulator is filled with adventure. Aim your target, launch missile, takedown criminals & terrorists and bombard enemy basecamps to become a legendary super hero of the world. Flying Tank War 2025 is a blend of army games, flying car games, simulation games and airplane fight games with a touch of extremely futuristic vehicle.

Flying Tank War 2025 features:

√ Amazing Futuristic Environment with Army force tanks

√ Super iron modern flying stunt tank with latest destructive weapons

√ Stunning 3D Graphics

√ Realistic Sound Effects of doom & destruction

√ Lots of Enemy Tanks, cars, trucks & firing

√ Easy and Smooth Controls
